EmailTemplate.name: FlightPlan_Online_Event_for_Airlines_by_Inmarsat_and_APEX.Save the date
EmailTemplate.subject: FlightPlan: online event for airlines by Inmarsat and APEX
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> ${headertext} ${ctaLinkText} <[[${ctaLink}]]> THE FUTURE OF AIR TRAVEL TECHNOLOGY
Josh Melin, Honeywell Forge ATR Leader, will talk about "Data as the Red Thread of Digitization." Josh will focus on how flight data drives insights and how these insights can help airlines improve operations and the customer experience.
Session start: 12:00 PM GMT NEXT GENERATION PASSENGER TRENDS
John Peterson, Vice President Services and Connectivity, will discuss "The Power of Free." John will cover both sides of the debate: connectivity as a driver for operational efficiencies and lower costs as well as revenue opportunities from improving the passenger experience.
Session start: 13:00 PM GMT
